description: Try our easy to follow Parmi Calzones recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Calzone,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Parmi Calzones Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine milk and garlic in a jug. Stir in yeast and oil and set aside for 5 minutes or until frothy. Combine flour, thyme and 1 tsp salt in a bowl. Make a well in the centre. Add milk mixture and stir in until combined. Turn out onto a lightly floured benchtop and knead until smooth.
Grease a clean bowl and add dough, turning to coat with oil. Cover with plastic and leave in a warm spot until doubled in size.
Knead again on a lightly floured benchtop for a few minutes or until smooth. Divide into quarters and roll out each to a 25cm round.

Brush half of each dough round with passata. Top with slices of chicken, a few spinach leaves, basil and cheese, reserving 1/4 cup. Fold dough over to form a semi-circle. Roll and pinch the edges together to seal. Transfer calzones to a baking tray lined with baking paper. Brush tops with oil. Make a few small slashes in the tops.

Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Heat a pizza stone, if you have one. Slide calzones onto stone or leave on baking tray. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden. Sprinkle with extra cheese. Return to oven for 5 minutes. Serve garnished with extra basil.
